description: Currently, the value of "scheduler_default_filters" is real one, not default one. so the "scheduler_default_filters" option is misleading.
title: rename the scheduler_default_filters opt

comments.content: Currently, the value of "scheduler_default_filters" is real one, not default one. so the "scheduler_default_filters" option is misleading.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhangchunlong1

comments.content:
a little bit confusing... 
scheduler_default_filters should be able to be changed by admin 
so default means default system setting 

e.g you can change this value , but the value on it is default
default_availability_zone
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
@whoever wants to work on this:
Please have a look at [1]. There is the config option which needs to be renamed. The new name could be "scheduler_hosts_filters". Be aware that other config options make use of that name in their help text, which means that needs to be updated too. You can use the "deprecated_name" attribute of the config option. Ping me in IRC (markus_z) if you have questions.

References:
[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/7e2f5c7d340a0131ac083ed036e417976d6342da/nova/conf/scheduler.py#L125
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
